div.p: Global ocean monthly mean anomaly of the LongWave Cloud Radiative Effect (LWCRE) between January 2008 and December 2014: ( a) observed by CERES (EBAF Ed. 4.0) and derived from space lidar observations, ( b) simulated by the LMDZ general circulation model and derived from synthetic space lidar observations obtained with a lidar simulator plugged on the LMDZ model. The anomaly is the difference between the value of a month and the mean over the whole 2008–2014 period. Surface temperature anomaly from ERA-I for observations and from model output for simulations are shown in light gray. Coefficient correlation R, standard deviations σ, and Mean Absolute Error (MAE) are given at the bottom of subplots.
